exam.title: Synthetic SAT Full Exam (Math + English)
exam.description: Fully synthetic SAT-style exam generated for project testing and exam pipelines.

questions.prompt: If x = 3, what is the value of 3x + 1?
If x = 4, what is the value of 3x + 2?
If x = 5, what is the value of 3x + 3?
If x = 6, what is the value of 3x + 4?
If x = 7, what is the value of 3x + 5?
If x = 8, what is the value of 3x + 6?
If x = 9, what is the value of 3x + 7?
If x = 10, what is the value of 3x + 8?
If x = 11, what is the value of 3x + 9?
If x = 12, what is the value of 3x + 10?
If x = 13, what is the value of 3x + 11?
If x = 14, what is the value of 3x + 12?
If x = 15, what is the value of 3x + 13?
If x = 16, what is the value of 3x + 14?
If x = 17, what is the value of 3x + 15?
If x = 18, what is the value of 3x + 16?
If x = 19, what is the value of 3x + 17?
If x = 20, what is the value of 3x + 18?
If x = 21, what is the value of 3x + 19?
If x = 22, what is the value of 3x + 20?
If x = 23, what is the value of 3x + 21?
If x = 24, what is the value of 3x + 22?

Which choice best completes the sentence?
The scientist's findings were ______ by years of careful observation.

choices.B: supported
choices.C: ignored

questions.prompt:

choices.A: Running quickly, the finish line was crossed by the athlete.
choices.B: The athlete, running quickly, crossed the finish line.
choices.C: The finish line was crossed quickly.
